methods.name: analyze()
methods.desc: Gets the content of the current audiobuffer from the input source.

methods.name: input()
methods.desc: Define the audio input for the analyzer.

description: This is a Waveform analyzer. It returns the waveform of an audio stream the moment it is queried with the analyze() method.
name: Waveform

parameters.name: nsamples
parameters.description: number of waveform samples that you want to be able to read at once (a positive integer).
